intro: Kopsia caerulea, commonly known as the blue kopsia, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. Kopsia caerulea is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
